verbose_text: Ductular reaction was graded semiquantitatively according to Yabushita et al. as follows : grade 1 : CK7 positivity in bile ducts and ductular reaction only, grade 2 : CK7 expression in the cytoplasm of periportal hepatocytes in addition to bile ductular reaction, grade 3 : CK7 expression in the cytoplasm of not only periportal but intralobular hepatocytes as well in addition to bile ductular reaction; and grade 4 : diffuse CK7 positive staining in the cytoplasm of the majority of hepatocytes in addition to bile duct and ductular epithelium [XREF_BIBR].
